# Test pool A1. Russell father. 90% male. Missing the pedigree of 2 males.

```{r}
A1_mp  <- c('CK02_04','CK06_01','CK13_02','CK20_01','CK51_06') # Male pool A1. Russell father. 90% male. Missing the pedigree of 2 males.
B2_mp  <- A1_mp ##Male pool B2 same as A1
C3_mp  <- A1_mp#Male pool C3 same as A1
D6_mp  <- c('CK02_04','CK06_01','CK09_06','CK13_02','CK20_01','CK51_06')#Test pool D6
E11_mp <- A1_mp#Male pool E11 same as A1
F12_mp <- A1_mp#Male pool F12 same as A1
G13_mp <- A1_mp#Male pool G13 same as A1
H14_mp <- A1_mp#Male pool H14 same as A1
I15_mp <- A1_mp#Male pool I15 same as A1
J16_mp <- A1_mp#Male pool J16 same as A1

#Full pool
CK02_01_tp <- c('CK15_03','CK17_02','CK20_01','Bejing #36','CK51_01')#Full pool CK02_01
CK10_02_tp <- c('CK17_03','CK18_01','CK19_03','CK51_09')#Full pool CK10_02
CK19_03_tp <- c('CK10_02','CK10_05','CK13_02','CK15_04','Bejing #36','CK51_01')#Full pool CK19_03
CK20_01_tp <- c('CK02_01','CK09_11','CK10_03')#Full pool CK20_01
CK22_03_tp <- c('CK23_08','CK51_09')#Full pool CK22_03
CK23_08_tp <- c('CK01_01_01_01','CK15_03','CK16_01','CK22_03')#Full pool CK23_08
CK51_01_tp <- c('CK02_01','CK17_03','CK19_03')#Full pool CK51_01

coanFn(A1_mp, myPed=pedigrees)
```
